title: Low-noise multi axis MEMS accelerometer
fig_desc: FIG. 1 is a schematic drawing of a MEMS accelerometer according to a first embodiment of the invention
all_fig_descs: FIG. 1 is a schematic drawing of a MEMS accelerometer according to a first embodiment of the invention
The view of FIG. 1 is taken through the middle of the structure layer of the MEMS accelerometer 101, i

The arrangement depicted in FIG. 1 is advantageous because it allows a single anchor point to be used for both stationary electrodes 107a, 107b, which eliminates movement of the stationary electrodes relative to one another due to deformations of the accelerometer, e
